title: Joshua's Shoarma Grill Kiosk
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanesse, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A kiosk cafe located inside the CC Continente Mall in Portimao. Has a number of clearly labelled vegan dishes, including falafel and kibbi along with other traditional Lebanese vegetarian salads such as tabbouleh and hummus. Part of a chain.
streetAddress: CC Continente de Portimao, Lj 216, Qta da Malata, Lote 1
